text:
Beautiful. One of the best parks in Singapore. There are many joggers and cyclists. Nearby residents like to bring their dogs for a walk too.

I urge NParks to maintain it and do not allow the upcoming condo developments ruin it. We need a lot of clean and green space for a healthy environment.

Smallish park in between the Alexandra Park Connector and Robertson Quay. You can have a splendid and scenic view of Jiak Kim Bridge, Singapore River, Robertson Quay and the surrounding condos, hotels and architecture from the park. Nice ambience, not crowded

A very nice and clean park for a morning or evening stroll. Lots of things to see including otters, monitor lizards and terrapins. There are mainly joggers and cyclists who use the shared track. Two thumbs up!

a really nice park where you can stroll alongside the singapore river! it's perfect for walking your pets, cycling, or hanging out with your friends and family. you can also grab a quick bite from the restaurants and small shops along the river!
Starting point nxt to Great World City at Zion Road. Can walk from there to Kim Seng Park n all the way to Boat Quay, etc.
